name: Let the Storm Rage On
author: R. la Barbera / L. Giammichele

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: Can I play Let the Storm Rage On if there are no characters in play?

A: Yes, you can. In this case you only draw a card.

flavor_text: The cold never bothered me anyway
rules_text: (A character with cost 3 or more can to sing this song for free.) Deal 2 damage to chosen character. Draw a card.
